<Text: Blanket bog:  The blanketing of the ground with a variable depth of peat gives the habitat type its name.>

<Text: Blanket bog:  Blanket bogs are found extensively throughout the northern hemisphere - well-studied examples are found in Ireland and Britain, but vast areas of the Russian and North American tundra also qualify as blanket bogs.>
